name: [a circle made of arrows]
description:
A small puzzle game for Black and White Jam #8. Place arrows to complete loops and clear them for points. Any un-cleared arrows at the end of a level will be bricked in and these bricks will need to be cleared.

The default keybinds for PICO-8 controls are the arrow keys for the D-pad, x for the x button, and z and c both for the o button. Press Enter or Esc to pause and/or toggle music; press Ctrl +/- to adjust volume.

(Strategy hint: A chain of arrows with one brick each can all be cleared just by activating the beginning of the line, but the second brick will stop the chain dead - be careful about long chains that you aren't clearing!)

(Footnote: Please let us know if you have any issues with any of the binaries! PICO-8 is a good piece of software, but we don't have our own Linux or MacOS machines to test on.)
